title: Planning and design:The planning and design of lifts including their number, type and capacity depending on the occupancy of the building, the population on each floor based on occupant load and the building height shall be in accordance with section 5 - Installation of lifts and Escalators,National Building Code of India
clause_text: Planning and design:The planning and design of lifts including their number, type and capacity depending on the occupancy of the building, the population on each floor based on occupant load and the building height shall be in accordance with section 5 - Installation of lifts and Escalators,National Building Code of India.
